ygData.subject: RE: Missed Notes
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering if this is a server specific issue also.  I am a lv 23 bard and last night while kiting a Stone Guardian in Nectulos Forest I was experiencing
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering if this is a server specific issue also. I am a lv 23
bard and last night while kiting a Stone Guardian in Nectulos Forest I was
experiencing quite a bit of lost notes while singing the standard bellow
bellow accelerando combo. In the end I had about 10-12 missed notes on
the bellow and about 5 on the accelerando. So here is my info to find out
if it may be server, or even server group related. I myself have been
getting bad server lag spikes.

Lvl 23
Karana Server
Wood Elf Bard
DEX 102
CHA 96

Hopefully this will help us get to the bottom of this. Now I do wonder if
casters are experiences differ between varying servers. I myself have had
strange increase in fizzles and interrupted spells with my lvl 17
magician.

Treilanin Loreweaver
Aariel
Honour Guard, Karana

On Wed, 11 Aug 1999, Lost Child wrote:

> From: "Lost Child" <lostchild@...>
>
> Could the missed notes only happens on certain server(s)? I am a lv 44 bard
> on Cazic-Thule server, and I haven't notice any extra missed notes since
> this thing started. Not enough to notice it anyway. Or maybe it only
> affects wood elf or human bard? I am a half elf. Or maybe it is level
> related? Seems like a lot of the people who have the missed notes are in
> their high 20s to high 30s.
